quest.name: Alternative Applications
journal: Redolent Rose appears perturbed and in need of assistance.
Forgoing explanations, the guildmaster requests that you make him a dozen bolts of undyed hempen cloth fast. Craft the required items, and deliver them to him posthaste.

Though the guildmaster is grateful for your aid in supplying the Immortal Flames' pressing need, he cannot hide his contempt for the adventurers whose irresponsible behavior occasioned it. Happily, the incident did present you with an opportunity to prove your worth, and Redolent Rose is now of the opinion that you are ready to accept commissions from Eustace at the Quicksand. You have taken a momentous step towards working for the Sunsilk brand.

※The next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose upon reaching level 15.
objectives: Deliver bolts of undyed hempen cloth to Redolent Rose.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Make me a dozen bolts of undyed hempen cloth as fast as you can.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Note the palpable sense of urgency. Time is of the essence, my girlboy!

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: We urgently need that cloth, Forename...

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Praise Nymeia for bringing you here when She did.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: There wasn't time to explain before, but Sunsilk Tapestries has the honor of supplying the Immortal Flames. Noble patrons, to be sure, but ones whose needs can be rather difficult to predict.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: On this particular occasion, a detachment of ale-soaked adventurers from the Foreign Brigade thought the Silver Bazaar an appropriate location for a bout of fisticuffs, resulting in a pressing need for bandages...

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Ordinarily, we would not accept such a large commission at short notice, but the Foreign Brigade is a favorite of Her Grace. It would not do to let the troublemakers suffer, even if they did bring it upon themselves...

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: And so your lovingly woven fabric will soon be wrapped around the cracked heads, gashed knees, and split knuckles of said ruffians.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Still, your time hasn't been entirely wasted. I daresay you can now weave hempen cloth in your sleep─which is a handy talent to have, given the fabric's many uses.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: You've made progress, in short. In fact, I do believe you're ready to undertake commissions.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: I refer to the kind of work doled out by Eustace at the Quicksand, of course. It'll be a while yet before you can be entrusted with anything bearing the Sunsilk name.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: But should you continue to improve at the rate you have been, that glorious day may not be so very far off...
